description:
General, our intelligence reports that an invasion of our homeland is imminent. 
Take command over our defence forces and throw back the enemy into the sea! 

Fight against more then 30 hostile ground and air units in 12 challenging missions in this "tower defense"-like strategy game.

Build and upgrade different Guns on strategical positions, to stop the advance of the enemy forces on the scrollable maps! 

Battle for a top placement in the online highscore list! 
***** New in 1.1.0 ***** 
In-game pause-function, the grade easy and medium are a little bit easier now, 4 new levels
